Title: Object: Aveugle au Caire
Series: L'Orient pittoresque
Series: Les Artistes anciens et modernes
Description: Plate 227: a blind Egyptian man, led by a young boy; the man is also aided by a walking stick; behind them at left, a wall; beyond at right, buildings and palm trees; published in 'Les Artistes Anciens et Modernes'. 1851/52 Lithograph
Curator's comments: For Curator's Comment see 1880,0710.183. For further information on the series, including dating, see Curator’s Comment on 1936,0302.14.1.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (17)
Beraldi 1885-92 / Les Graveurs du dix-neuvième siècle (Vol. II, p. 73)
Acquisition notes: 1880,0710.1 to 250 constitute a series of plates for 'Les artistes anciens et modernes' from 1842-60.
